item.title:
RT by @WhoresofYore: From 1774 until his death, castrati Venanzio Rauzzini had an important & varied musical career in Britain. He performed & composed, managed a concert series in Bath for 30 years & was a renowned singing instructor üéº

item.title: RT by @WhoresofYore: did you know there was a special birthing ale that was brewed early in a pregnancy to be drunk by the mom while she was giving birth and the midwife? and what was left was used to wash the new born. cool, huh?
item.dc:creator: @TerribleLotus1
item.description:

item.title: RT by @WhoresofYore: In 1758, Benjamin Franklin published an instructional manual containing matters "more immediately useful to us Americans." The book contained advice on all sorts of topics including writing, bookkeeping, arithmetic... and a recipe for inducing abortion.

item.title:

item.title:
The Zodiac Man, by an unknown Persian artist, dating to the 19th century. Zodiac Man represents a roughly consistent correlation of zodiacal names with body parts.*

*Sorry, Scorpios.
